name: Bread Baking Sim
description:
Controls

WASD to move

Spacebar to Jump

E to interact

ESC quits the Game with no menu (yet)

L Shift Sprints

Q Dashes

there's currently no controller support

View Patchnotes here

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NniytRMdPst5Sg8GHQI6xPJy-jZI4GDCGUhehB_dvJA/...

I spent a binge 20 hours making a movement game and liked the final product

I hope to make an adventure game similar to SM64 with multiple collectibles that let you explore further into land.

feedback and ideas are appreciated
